creditline: Gift of Mrs. Arthur Bliss Lane in memory of her husband, Mr. Arthur B. Lane
object_name: Knife, from a flatware dessert service
provenance:
Possibly given c.1763 by Duchess Maria Antonia of Bavaria (1724-1780), Princess of Bavaria, Electress of Saxony, to Władysław Aleksander Łubieński (1703-1767), Primate of Poland [1]. 
[1] Łubieński served as Interrex of the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth after the death of Augustus III of Poland in October 1763, while Duchess Maria Antonia from December 1763 served as Regent of Saxony after the death of her husband, Augustus's son, Frederick Christian, Elector of Saxony. Stanisław August Poniatowski was elected King of Poland in September 1764.
title: Knife, from a flatware dessert service
